text: garaz moosa ka chhotee ladakee se nikaah ho gaya aur rahane lage phir jab moosa ne apanee (das baras kee) muddat pooree kee aur beevee ko lekar chale to andhereeraat jaadon ke din raah bhool gae aur beebee safoora ko dard zeh shuru hua (itane mein) kohetoor kee taraph aag dikhaayee dee to apane ladake baalon se kaha tum log thaharo maine yaqeenan aag dekhee hai (mai vahaan jaata hoon) kya ajab hai vahaan se (raaste kee) kuchh khabar laoon ya aag kee koee chingaaree (leta aaoon) taaki tum log taapo
